titleStmt.title: Auden Musulin Papers: A Digital Edition of W. H. Auden´s Letters to Stella Musulin (FWF P 33754)
Typed Letter Signed W. H. Auden to Stella Musulin with Typescript W. H. Auden "Joseph Weinheber" 1965-03-15
titleStmt.author: Auden, W. H.
Musulin, Elsa Gerda Maria Louise Pauline von

edition.title: Typed Letter Signed W. H. Auden to Stella Musulin with Typescript W. H. Auden "Joseph Weinheber" 1965-03-15

interp.desc:
In the legal terminology of Early Modern High German, "Gemein(de)pflicht" ("communal duty") designates the "pledge to be made by the new citizen of a community" ("Gemeindepflicht", Deutsches Rechtswörterbuch).
Gemeindepflicht Deutsches Rechtswörterbuch (DRW) Heidelberger Akademie der Wissenschaften

publicationStmt.publisher: Austrian Centre for Digital Humanities and Cultural Heritage

licence.p: You are free to: Share — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format; adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.
The licensor cannot revoke these freedoms as long as you follow the license terms. Under the following terms:

Attribution — You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use. No additional restrictions — You may not apply legal terms or technological measures that legally restrict others from doing anything the license permits.

You do not have to comply with the license for elements of the material in the public domain or where your use is permitted by an applicable exception or limitation. No warranties are given. The license may not give you all of the permissions necessary for your intended use. For example, other rights such as publicity, privacy, or moral rights may limit how you use the material.

availability.p: Copyright literary texts W. H. Auden Estate of W. H. Auden.

seriesStmt.p: Machine-Readable Transcriptions of the Auden Musulin Papers

glyph.desc: lower-case German ä rendered by superimposing typed double-quotation-mark character (") on typed lower-case a

correspContext.ref: Autograph Letter Signed W. H. Auden to Stella Musulin 1964-12-23
Autograph Letter Signed W. H. Auden to Stella Musulin with Typescript W. H. Auden "Joseph Weinheber" 1965-04-28 and with Typescript W. H. Auden Translation "Joseph Weinheber"

revisionDesc.change: transcription reviewed, `space` element and `hand` attributes added, date format in `origDate` and `correspAction`/`date` modified

space.extent: undefined quantity of characters plus minimum

lg.l: They buried you like a loved
A nasty stink and the young
A season of dread and tears
Lonfg carted away: for their raped
Were both born since the Shadow
No one,so far as we know,

div.ab:
___
N I) Quotation from W8's poem Auf das Unabwendbare.
2) Quotation from W's poem Kammermusik.
__

div.p:
Kirchstetten is intending to have a ceroemony in memory of the twentieth
anniversary of Weinheber'ws death. Herewith my effort to do my
Gemeindepflicht.

postscript.p:
P.S. Expect to return K April 22nd. Do hope you
will be around.
